CustomField.formula: IF( isAlready_provided__c == true, IMAGE("/resource/DocumentRequestedIcons/docsReq/green.png", "Already Provided", 20, 20)& " Already Provided", IF( isApplicable__c == true, IMAGE("/resource/DocumentRequestedIcons/docsReq/yellow.png", "Not Applicable", 20, 20) & " Not Applicable", IF( isComplete__c == true, IMAGE("/resource/DocumentRequestedIcons/docsReq/darkgreen.png", "Submitted", 20, 20) & " Submitted", IMAGE("/resource/DocumentRequestedIcons/docsReq/red.png", "Requested", 20, 20) & " Requested" )))
CustomField.label: Status
